title: Compass Steel (No Ads)
summary: Elegant and smooth compass. No ads.
description: FEATURES:• Ad-free digital compass app.• Choose from multiple color themes.• Choose between 2 heading modes - True heading (based on True north) and Magnetic heading (based on Magnetic north). • Sun direction indicator.• Moon direction indicator.• Set and save a target direction. • Tilt-compensated and self-calibrates as you use.• High contrast design improves readability.PERMISSIONS:• Requires access to location coordinates to calculate True heading.Any suggestions or feedback are warmly welcomed.
descriptionHTML:
FEATURES:
• Ad-free digital compass app.
• Choose from multiple color themes.
• Choose between 2 heading modes - True heading (based on True north) and Magnetic heading (based on Magnetic north).
• Sun direction indicator.
• Moon direction indicator.
• Set and save a target direction.
• Tilt-compensated and self-calibrates as you use.
• High contrast design improves readability.

PERMISSIONS:
• Requires access to location coordinates to calculate True heading.


Any suggestions or feedback are warmly welcomed.
comments: Seems to be working well enough. It calibrated and displayed an image that was 2° different to a genuine mag compass. The needle did move around a bit even after leaving the device alone and on a table. Overall this app seems to be reasonably stable and accurate.

It works great on my mobile, but it sucks in my smartwatch (ticwatch E): it never shows the correct direction. Also tried to callibrate in my smartwatch but my screen goes off and I'm not sure if the calibration is complete or not    :\

Great, convenient compass. Calibrating it before each use takes a whole 2 seconds. After my first two dozen uses it's never been more than a couple of degrees off. Simple & very easy to use. Nice choice in appearance/color of display.  This app is a solid winner!  And no ads.
Free, no ads, works & looks good...could not ask for more.
Some parts of town seem to make it spin weird but it ends up right.
Best Free (beats most not free), simple, elegant, what-you-need and functional
